programme.desc: The overnight flash flood that hit Jabodetabek flooded Kincir Village until it became a lake that never subsided. Some residents were killed and others were declared missing. programme.title: Ambisi Licik Penjual Ikan Asin
programme.desc: Anwar is one of the salted fish traders in the fishermen's market who has a cunning, rude, and wealth-crazy character. One day, Anwar boldly mixes formalin into his salted fish in order to get a big profit. Some time later, Endah, Anwar's wife, tried to advise her husband, but Anwar was rude to her. What is the next story?

But out of sincere love, Dastan chooses to leave his wealth-crazed family for Melati, a simple woman with a very kind heart.

programme.title: Berkah Ramadan Tukang Sapu Jalanan (SPC Ramadhan)
programme.desc: Taufik (Iqbal Pakula), a street sweeper, has a daughter named Nisa (Syaquila) who is blind. Taufik works hard and honestly to send Nisa to a special school (SLB). Taufik gets a test from Anwar (Denino) and Neti (Winda Puspita) who cheat by spreading nails on the streets, so that their tire patch business becomes busy. Taufik picks up the nails that are scattered on the streets, Neti and Anwar feel disturbed and immediately drop Taufik's life.

programme.title: Cinta Karena Cinta - EP 238
programme.desc: 15 years ago, Jenar found himself in a tragic event that claimed the lives of his family. Mila, who is Jenar's older sister, is still alive after Ayu's adoption. Jenar's life changes after meeting Mirza, a man who is attractedtoher.

programme.title: Trio Baperan Kena Polusi Cinta
programme.desc: Three young men named Malik, Jajang and Jarwo were accepted to work in a company owned by a beautiful girl named Dina. The three seem to be in love with the charm of their boss. But secretly Malik, who is known as a playboy, hurt Dina's younger brother Monic. Dina as the older sister did not remain silent, she secretly took revenge by making the three of them feel sorry for her and then ignoring their love.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 224
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: Love Story The Series S2 - EP 209
programme.desc: Kendra's meeting with Maudy began with an accidental meeting at the Villa, that's where Ken first saw Maudy and immediately fell in love. At first Maudy was disturbed by Ken's presence, the horse Maudy was riding accidentally got angry and fell into the river, not long after Ken jumped to save Maudy.

programme.title: Berkah Ramadan Gadis Penjual Dodol (SPC Ramadhan)
programme.desc: Abi (Kevin Kambey) is kicked out of the house for being unruly. Talita (Elma Agustin), who knew Abi was kicked out and had nothing, left him immediately. Abi, who didn't know where to go, was suddenly hit by a motorcycle and helped by Rindu (Georgina). Rindu also invites him home and is given a place to stay in the room next to the mosque by Komar (Tasman Taher), Rindu's father. Abi feels ashamed because he hasn't prayed in a long time. Komar teaches him again and advises Abi about prayer.

programme.title: Hot Tea Hot Tea Kalau Jatuh Hati_x000D__x000D_
programme.desc: Zulfa and Kevin were forced to go to a dating agency, but they were betrayed by their respective partners. Because Zulfa and Kevin both needed a partner for a mission, the dating agency finally suggested they work together. After being introduced to Zulfa's mother, it turns out that Kevin is the son of her friend. Zulfa's mother forced Kevin and Zulfa to get married immediately.

programme.title: Cinta Kadang Gulali Ke Bawah Kadang Gulali Keatas_x000D__x000D_
programme.desc: Ruby (Shanice Margaretha) must take the place of her mother who sells cotton candy in front of the school. While serving a girl, Ruby is accused by Angkasa (Fero Walandouw) of being a syndicate of child kidnappers. Ruby does not accept the accusation and defends herself.

programme.desc: Yanuar is very grateful to be able to work at Ustadz Irfan's farm because his figure is very wise and can accept it. Although Yanuar has repented for stealing, the title will never be separated from him. In his repentance, there are trials for Yanuar such as want who never liked Yanuar and influenced the residents. Even in his work, Iwan has the heart to mix chicken food with poison so that all the chickens die. Yanuar is also accused of stealing Ustadz Irfan's money because his mother is sick.

programme.desc: 15 years ago, Jenar found himself in a tragic event that claimed the lives of his family. Mila, who is Jenar's older sister, is still alive after Ayu's adoption. Jenar's life changes after meeting Mirza, a man who is attractedtoher.

programme.title: Trio Baperan Kena Polusi Cinta
programme.desc: Three young men named Malik, Jajang and Jarwo were accepted to work in a company owned by a beautiful girl named Dina. The three seem to be in love with the charm of their boss. But secretly Malik, who is known as a playboy, hurt Dina's younger brother Monic. Dina as the older sister did not remain silent, she secretly took revenge by making the three of them feel sorry for her and then ignoring their love.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 225
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: Berkah Ramadan Gadis Penjual Dodol (SPC Ramadhan)
programme.desc: Abi (Kevin Kambey) is kicked out of the house for being unruly. Talita (Elma Agustin), who knew Abi was kicked out and had nothing, left him immediately. Abi, who didn't know where to go, was suddenly hit by a motorcycle and helped by Rindu (Georgina). Rindu also invites him home and is given a place to stay in the room next to the mosque by Komar (Tasman Taher), Rindu's father. Abi feels ashamed because he hasn't prayed in a long time. Komar teaches him again and advises Abi about prayer.

programme.title: Love Story The Series S2 - EP 211
programme.desc: Kendra's meeting with Maudy began with an accidental meeting at the Villa, that's where Ken first saw Maudy and immediately fell in love. At first Maudy was disturbed by Ken's presence, the horse Maudy was riding accidentally got angry and fell into the river, not long after Ken jumped to save Maudy.

programme.title: Sepenggal Mimpi Gadis Tukang Sayur Keliling Yang Bercita-Cita Menjadi Seorang Gu
programme.desc: Nesa is a girl who has noble dreams of becoming a teacher. But unfortunately Nesa has to fight with the harshness of life. Nesa's steps to achieve her noble ideals did not go smoothly and were full of steep roads that she had to go through.

programme.title: Cinta Karena Cinta - EP 240
programme.desc: 15 years ago, Jenar found himself in a tragic event that claimed the lives of his family. Mila, who is Jenar's older sister, is still alive after Ayu's adoption. Jenar's life changes after meeting Mirza, a man who is attractedtoher.

programme.title: Pelan Pelan Bejek Cintanya Neng Supir Uwiuwiuw
programme.desc: Aryo was given a will by his mother to go to Jakarta to look for his uncle. But on the way he is stranded in a village in Tasik. He meets Lala, an ambulance driver who helps him. Aryo is forced to disguise himself as Christ Marto, a Caucasian who is going to have a concert in the village.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 226
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. programme.desc: Kamyar and Nadine make the most of a barbecue to introduce Josee to their friend Martin. Annie and Philippe quietly sneak off for a nap with edouard, but forget to turn off the baby monitor camera...

programme.title: Survivre A Ses Enfants - EP 4
programme.desc: Impossible to get away from the kids for an adults-only dinner! As Kamyar worries about Jasmine, who's at a teenage party, Annie has serious doubts about her father's ability to look after edouard.

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 19
programme.desc: To Meudon and a private tour of Rodin's studio. Virginie Friedmann and Delphine Versace: a love story filled with sublime materials and unexpected surprises. Gucci's fashion garden brings bucolic effervescence and a touch of vintage to the 2025 cruise collection. Making the ''chistera'', exceptional know-how in the Basque country.

programme.title: Crime A Ramatuelle
programme.desc: Sebastien Lacassagne, a young owner of a vineyard, is found murdered. The prosecutor elisabeth Richard and Captain Martinez launch an investigation. The list of suspects gets longer as they make progress, without counting a journalist who draws their attention to a murder that took place two years earlier.

programme.title: Tendance XXI - EP 23
programme.desc: Spotlight on the work of Metiers Rares, with Raphaelle Le Baud. All about the rather vague origins of the Parisian baguette. Welcome to Fouquet, sweet and chocolate-maker since 1862. A contemporary twist for the traditional trench coat. Born of a mother-daughter collaboration, BLEU.M offers clothes designed and produced in Seine-Saint-Denis.

programme.desc: 'In Search of Lost Time'', the immense novel by Proust, has itself become the subject of study, that of the period between 1880 and the Great War. By creating a dialogue between images of the Belle epoque and the book, Thierry Thomas walks in the footsteps of the French writer.

programme.title: Nos Terres Gourmandes - EP 13
programme.desc: Journey along the magnificent Lake Bourget, the starting point for a gourmet tour viewing the treasures around this magnificent Savoyard lake.

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Crime A Biot
programme.desc: Marie Lemaire, wealthy heiress, is poisoned during a dinner of the Biot Trade Association, making all the guests potential suspects. Two days later, another of those present dies, poisoned, leaving a suicide note and confessing to the murder. But the deputy public prosecutor elisabeth Richard remains unconvinced.

programme.title: 20h30 Le Dimanche
programme.desc: Film, music, sport, literature, politics... Laurent Delahousse's guests talk about themselves and their lives, their careers and their projects, and discuss the news making the headlines of the day. The programme closes with a live musical performance.

programme.title: Les Docs De La Grande Librairie - Maupassant
programme.desc: The author of ''Good Friend'', ''A Life'' and ''The Horla'' was a veritable comet. In twelve years Guy de Maupassant wrote six novels, seven plays, some three hundred novellas and thousands of articles... before dying in 1893, aged 42. A look back at the life and career of an anticonformist.

programme.title: Destination Francophonie - EP 15
programme.desc: Exploring Taiwan's cultural and natural treasures, such as the Penghu archipelago, a protected jewel closely connected with the French-speaking world. programme.title: Wilder - EP 1
programme.desc: Inspector Rosa Wilder has returned to Oberwies, the village where she was born in the Swiss Alps. As a major building project is being planned to bring life back the little mountain community, a murder puts everything in question. Rosa and Manfred Kgi head the investigation...

programme.title: Wilder - EP 2
programme.desc: With the murder of the famous artist Armon Todt and the kidnapping of the daughter of the billionaire Al-Baroudi, fear and suspicion in Oberwies reach fever pitch. The tension is palpable as each villager seems to have something to hide...

programme.title: Movie - Spyder
programme.desc: Shiva, an intelligence officer, develops a phone software that helps him track those in need of help. He sets out to save the people of Hyderabad when he realises that a serial killer is on the loose.

programme.title: Movie - Don Seenu
programme.desc: Seenu has only one ambition, and that is to become a don. He joins hands with one of the city's mafia kingpins and gains his trust, but is caught in a fix when he goes on a mission to Germany.

programme.title: Movie - Kangalal Kaidhusei
programme.desc: Despite inheriting a huge fortune from his parents, Vaseegaran, a kleptomaniac, steals a diamond from a store and Vidhya, a salesgirl, is blamed. However, while clearing her name, he falls in love.

programme.title: Movie - Kanmani Unakaga
programme.desc: Kanmani Unakkaga is a 1999 Tamil-language film directed by the duo Ravi-Raja. The film stars Ishaq Hussaini and Suvaluxmi, while Senthil and Jennifer portray supporting roles.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Kudaikul Mazhai
programme.desc: Parthiban, an auto rickshaw driver, falls in love with a girl who loves him too. But later Parthiban learns that the girl is a TV show anchor and was just faking her love for him.

programme.title: Movie - Thoondil
programme.desc: Anjali and Sriram, a happy London-based couple, undergo fertility treatment in order to conceive. Nine years later, Divya, who had donated her eggs, kidnaps the child. She is also Sriram's ex-lover.

programme.title: Movie - Sollamale
programme.desc: Shwetha, a rich and kind woman, assumes that Nadaraj cannot speak and shows empathy towards him. When their friendship blossoms into love, Nadaraj faces an arduous task of proving his love.

programme.title: Movie - One Two Three
programme.desc: Three men with physical impairments lead rather dull and monotonous lives. However, when a young woman befriends them, it brings about many positive changes in them.

programme.title: Movie - Chathrapathi
programme.desc: A bus driver and caretaker at an orphanage is found to be responsible for the deaths of several anti-social elements. A politician who loses one of his men at the hands of the driver realises that this man is a former army major.

programme.title: Movie - Kutra Pirivu
programme.desc: When Inspector Ranadheer learns about the corrupt ways of Ravikanth, he sets out to expose him. In the process, he loses his wife.

programme.title: Movie - Kanna
programme.desc: Annapoorani, a class 10 student, encounters Kanna, a tour guide, during her school educational trip to Ooty. She develops feelings for him and runs away from home to meet him on her scooter.

programme.title: Movie - Karadi
programme.desc: Karadi is a 1980 Indian Tamil movie. The cast and crew of Karadi includes M.G.C. Sukumar.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Enakku Oru Magan Pirappan
programme.desc: Balu's mother desperately wants a grandson, but his wife gives birth to a baby girl. As Balu's mother suffers a heart attack, he ends up showing his friend's newborn son as his own to make her happy.

programme.title: Movie - Vasanthakala Paravai
programme.desc: Ravi, a shopkeeper, falls in love with Uma, a student who belongs to a rich family. But their relationship is tested when Uma's brother decides to intervene and break their bond.

programme.title: Movie - Thaaimaman
programme.desc: Meena refuses to marry Rasappan as he is uneducated and rustic. In order to win her heart, he decides to become a minister and achieve success.

programme.title: Movie - Thoongathe Thambi Thoongathe
programme.desc: Desperate for work, an educated youth pretends to be a gardener. Later, he falls in love with his employer's daughter while his family wants him to marry someone else.

programme.title: Movie - Kizhakku Cheemayile
programme.desc: A brother shares a close bond with his sister and is ecstatic to see her get married. However, problems arise when his new brother-in-law disapproves of the siblings' relationship.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 26
programme.desc: We gather a panel of experts to tackle a nearly impossible question: What truly is the Greatest Premier League Game Ever? Join two ex-footballers, a seasoned commentator, and a top football journalist as they lock horns in a passionate roundtable discussion. The panel revisits iconic moments, dissecting tactics, and legendary performances. Expect banter, bold claims, and maybe even a few surprises, as they strive to settle the debate-or perhaps keep it alive.

programme.desc: A deep dive into the tactical trends and statistical insights of modern football with input from players, managers and data experts from the 'fanalyst' community. programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 36
programme.desc: We celebrate the life and legacy of Jose Antonio Reyes, a footballing talent whose brilliance on the pitch captured the hearts of fans worldwide. From his early days at Sevilla to his success with Arsenal, PL Stories honours his incredible achievements. We also reflect on his tragic passing, remembering a player whose untimely loss left an indelible mark on the football world.

programme.title: PL GOATS - EP 4

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 34
programme.desc: A product of Barcelona's famed La Masia youth academy, Cesc Fabregas is rightly remembered as one of the greatest midfield players of his generation. After making his Arsenal debut at just 16 years of age the diminutive Spaniard would go on to win titles in both England and Spain as well as becoming a World Cup winner in 2010. Now taking his first steps into coaching with Como 1907, Fabregas reflects on his footballing education as well as his hopes for the future in management.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 42
programme.desc: In this PL Stories show, Tim Howard, who has neurodiverse conditions, leads a conversation with past and present players, exploring the challenges and strengths of living with neurodiversity. Through personal stories, including those of Joao Gomes (stutter), Steven Naismith (dyslexia), Greg Halford (autism), and Charlie Austin (ADHD), the show celebrates resilience and the positive impact neurodiverse traits bring to the football world.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 32
programme.desc: As Thomas Tuchel begins his journey as England's new manager, PL Stories dives into his journey to the top, tracing his rise from playing career to football management. After facing financial struggles and working in a bar, Tuchel's determination led him to become one of the Premier League's most respected managers. We showcase his unique path, blending hard work, passion, and tactical innovation to reach the pinnacle of football.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 4
programme.desc: In December 2023, Bournemouth v Luton is abandoned when Tom Lockyer faced a life-threatening situation on the pitch. He survived and watched the rematch, which turned into a Premier League classic. Andoni Iraola, Lewis Cook and Antoine Semenyo tell the story.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 49
programme.desc: Upon creating an American Ice Hockey team, owner Bill Foley outlandlishly claimed his team would lift the Stanley Cup in six years. His dream came true. Now, owner of AFC Bournemouth and flying in the Premier League, he's already making bold claims for the Cherries' future.

programme.title: THE ART OF... - EP 1

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 39
programme.desc: We explore Arsene Wenger's managerial journey before joining Arsenal, tracing his evolution from a young, innovative coach in France to a transformative force in European football. Delving into his time at Nancy, AS Monaco and Nagoya Grampus Eight, Wenger's tactical brilliance began to shape his future success. We highlight the key moments that led him to one of football's most iconic roles.

programme.title: FS MMA Dennis Hallman vs. Jeremiah Metcalf
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! Each fighter is a submission specialist and one fighter ends the bout with a submission victory inside the first round when Dennis "Superman" Hallman meets Jeremiah Metcalf in a middleweight fight from San Jose, CA, USA.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Joe Calzaghe vs Roy Jones Jr.
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features a light heavyweight championship match between Joe Calzaghe (45-0, 32 KOs) and Roy Jones Jr. (52-4, 38 KOs) from Madison Square Garden in New York City, New York, USA, on November 8, 2008.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS WCK Nordin Ben Moh vs Jonay Risco
programme.desc: WCK features intense, nonstop battles in both freestyle kickboxing and Muay Thai from around the world. It's kickboxing's most talented athletes at their finest! This episode, from Antwerp, Belgium, features main event Nordin Ben Moh (Morocco) vs Jonay Risco (Spain) plus Percy De Maeyer vs. Ali Makhi and Mohamed El Moussaoui vs. Filip Verlinden.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Amir Khan vs. Danny Garcia
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a light welterweight title unification bout between Amir Khan and Danny Garcia. Also on the card, former heavyweight champ James Kirkland.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 3 featuring Kotoyuki, Asanoyama, Aoiyama and Ryuden from the Kyushu basho, 2019.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best of the first ever Judo Grand Prix from Cancun, stop to get to know number 2 ranked fighter in the world Tal Flicker, and show a demonstration on how to execute one of Flicker's favorite submissions.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode features a look at how John Alessio, a MMA veteran of almost 20 years, prepares for an upcoming fight. We head inside the kitchen of one of MMA's leading nutritionists, Mike Dolce, to find out what are the approved foods in the Dolce Diet. Melvin Guillard summons his inner daredevil and jumps off the Stratosphere in Las Vegas, plus much more.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Yuriorkis Gamboa vs. Marcos Ramirez
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features undefeated featherweights Yuriorkis Gamboa, 'El Cinclon de Guantanamo', (11-0, 9 KOs) and Marcos Ramirez (25-0, 16 KOs) from the Pechanga Resort and Casino in Temecula, California, USA, on October 4, 2008. The two young fighters had a quick ending street brawl that brought the crowd to its feet.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Victor Ortiz vs. Vivian Harris
programme.desc: Wide World Of Fights includes all styles of fighting from around the world in one show! This episode features a middleweight brawl between top contenders Victor Ortiz and Vivian Harris, as well as kickboxing, sumo, arm wrestling and more!

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Dublin, Ireland welcomes one of the most anticipated events in Martial Arts this year as the Karate 1 Premier League returns. This will be the first Karate 1 Premier League event to take place in Dublin, with many of the top competitors in the world making the journey to Ireland for the first time and where the new Grand Winners will be crowned.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Sergio Martinez vs. Paul Williams (II)
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is the second encounter between middleweights Paul Williams and Sergio Martinez. This time around, championship gold is on the line in a bout that will not go the distance. Also on the card, Marcos Maidana tries to jump up a weight class.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 4 featuring Daieisho, Onosho, Abi and Takayasu from the Kyushu basho, 2019.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS WCK Jouri de Sousa vs Robin Ciric
programme.desc: WCK features intense, nonstop battles in both freestyle kickboxing and Muay Thai from around the world. It's kickboxing's most talented athletes at their finest! This episode, from Hamburg, Germany, features main event Jouri de Sousa (Angola) vs. Robin Ciric (Serbia).

programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! Future UFC contender Jorge Masvidal takes on Keith Wisniewski in Costa Rica.

programme.desc: Wide World Of Fights includes all styles of fighting from around the world in one show! This episode features a middleweight brawl between top contenders Victor Ortiz and Vivian Harris, as well as kickboxing, sumo, arm wrestling and more!

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Dublin, Ireland welcomes one of the most anticipated events in Martial Arts this year as the Karate 1 Premier League returns. This will be the first Karate 1 Premier League event to take place in Dublin, with many of the top competitors in the world making the journey to Ireland for the first time and where the new Grand Winners will be crowned.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Sergio Martinez vs. Paul Williams (II)
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is the second encounter between middleweights Paul Williams and Sergio Martinez. This time around, championship gold is on the line in a bout that will not go the distance. Also on the card, Marcos Maidana tries to jump up a weight class.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 4 featuring Daieisho, Onosho, Abi and Takayasu from the Kyushu basho, 2019.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS WCK Jouri de Sousa vs Robin Ciric
programme.desc: WCK features intense, nonstop battles in both freestyle kickboxing and Muay Thai from around the world. It's kickboxing's most talented athletes at their finest! This episode, from Hamburg, Germany, features main event Jouri de Sousa (Angola) vs. Robin Ciric (Serbia).

programme.title: FS MMA Jorge Masvidal vs. Keith Wisiewski
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! Future UFC contender Jorge Masvidal takes on Keith Wisniewski in Costa Rica.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Andre Berto vs. Carlos Quintana
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features undeafeated Andre Berto (25-0, 19 KOs) in his 4th defense of the WBC Welterweight Title as he takes on former WBO Champion Carlos 'El Indio' Quintana (27-2, 21 KOs) at the BankAtlantic Center in Sunrise, Florida, USA on April 10, 2010.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: Travel to the Miami, Florida to witness fitness fanatics face off in the Southeast finals. 30 contestants from across the region have arrived to the tropical coastal city, and the competition is heating up! All these athletes aspire to advance to the nationals in Las Vegas, where Mount Midoriyama waits, and the winner receives half a million dollars plus the coveted title of American Ninja Warrior. Part 2 of 2.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Lamont Peterson vs. Amir Khan
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Lamont Peterson facing Amir Khan in a light welterweight title bout that ends in a controversial decision due to a point deduction. Also on the card, heavyweight kickboxing action.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 5 featuring Abi, Hakuho, Takakeisho and Asanoyama from the Kyushu basho, 2019.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best of the Hohhot Grand Prix, and stop to get to know the world's #1 ranked fighter Aleksandar Kukolj. We then head to Russia to witness the effect that Judo has on the Russian people.

programme.title: XMA
programme.desc: In this episode we focus on the martial art of breaking and how the techniques are fine-tuned with technology.

programme.title: Us Halftime Report
programme.desc: "Halftime Report" is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBCs Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: Us The Exchange
programme.desc: CNBCs "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for todays Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to todays markets and investors. CNBCs deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Us Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the days agenda. Airing CNBCs award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBCs Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, whats driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell

programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrows trading day.

programme.title: Asia Squawk Box
programme.desc: Anchored by Martin Soong and Sri Jegarajah at the Singapore Exchange (SGX), "Squawk Box" is CNBCs flagship show that sets the news agenda and takes viewers through the pre-game and opening of Asia's business trading day, covering the top market moving stories and views from the top CEOs, asset managers and newsmakers.

programme.title: Us Squawk On The Street
programme.desc: Headquartered live on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) where the biggest companies in the world trade, "Squawk On The Street" tracks the action of every stock and gives you access to the treasury, currency and commodity action in real time. The show also covers the final hour of European trading, providing investors with actionable insight on the best course of action to take in U.S. based markets.

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: How do you tell dusk from dawn in the age of climate change? Host Nikolaj Coster-Waldau begins his global journey to find out.

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Shelter is one of humanity's most basic needs. As the global population grows, how can we rethink the way we live to build a more sustainable tomorrow?

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: Nature's ability to regenerate existed long before humans inhabited the Earth. What can we learn from its innate ability to help fix the damage we've done?

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: In a world where global warming has made food harder to grow, how we plant and harvest are critical issues when it comes to adapting to climate change.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 9
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets Endeavor & TKO CEO Ari Emanuel to discuss how he built a multi-billion dollar sports and entertainment empire, the future of Hollywood and what's next.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 10
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets Instacart CEO Fidji Simo in her hometown in the South of France, and learns about her journey from a small fishing village to the C-Suite in Silicon Valley.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 11
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets AMD CEO Lisa Su on the heels of her 10-year anniversary as CEO at the chipmaker's labs in Austin, Texas.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 12
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets NBA player & Thirty Ink CEO Stephen Curry to discuss his growing business portfolio, partnership with Under Armour and retail ambitions to rival Nike's Jordan Brand.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: Emily Chang interviews JPMorgan Chief Executive Officer Jamie Dimon, a titan in the banking industry known for his freewheeling style, about his outlook on markets, tech and geopolitical risk.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 8
programme.desc: Inside Mark Zuckerberg's AI Era. Mark Zuckerberg discusses how Meta's newest AI model Llama 3.1 will shape the future of business, technology and society.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance Radio
programme.desc: The economy and the markets are "under surveillance" as we cover the latest in finance, economics and investment. Join Tom Keene, Paul Sweeney, Lisa Mateo, Michael Barr and other guests.

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: Artificial intelligence has begun to exhibit early signs of agency. Are we on a path to superintelligence? Self destruction? Or is the potential promise and threat of AI being overblown?

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: Bioacoustics technology and AI are revealing how animals communicate, and may soon allow us to talk to them ourselves. What can we learn from wildlife? And should we be talking to the animals at all?

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: With the promise of unimaginable computing power, a global race for quantum supremacy is raging. Who will be first to harness this new technological force, and what will they do with it?

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: Water. Our survival depends on water, yet global reserves are rapidly shrinking. Can technology help secure humanity's future water needs?

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 5
programme.desc: For some, pain is excruciating and inescapable. But amid the continuing fallout of the opioid crisis, new technologies are being developed to limit and even eliminate pain.

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 6
programme.desc: Soon, another billion people will be online. How will these new users embrace this technology to transform their lives, and what will it mean for the rest of the world?

programme.title: The Growing Toll of America's Booming Kratom Industry
programme.desc: In this Bloomberg Originals documentary, we reveal how the unregulated substance is being promoted and even made more potent, and how some users are ending up dead.

programme.title: How India's Narendra Modi Took Power
programme.desc: Narendra Modi, India's prime minister, is both highly popular and deeply polarizing. How did he get to the top of Indian politics, and what do his policies mean for the country's future?

programme.title: Bloomberg BusinessWeek
programme.desc: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec bring together the latest news from the world of business and finance by harnessing the power of Bloomberg Businessweek reporters and editors.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: The demand for human eggs is booming, giving rise to a largely unregulated and dangerous marketplace. In India, we meet a teenage girl caught up in this fertility underworld.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: In a Kampala slum, a group of midwives help vulnerable mothers give birth for free. Under a mile away, a private hospital is out of reach for most of the community, with devastating consequences.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: Fake permits, undercover informants and millions of dollars. How a US government agency set out to prove suppliers to research labs were importing wild monkeys from Cambodia with false paperwork.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: Last year alone, an estimated $1 trillion was lost globally to fraud. With law enforcement struggling to cope, scambaiter vigilantes are filling the gaps.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S3 - EP 2
programme.desc: The Green Bible is the single-most important document in the Italian government's war against an alleged Nigerian mafia. But this supposed mafia handbook isn't what it claims to be at all.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S3 - EP 3
programme.desc: The tale of the strange life and stranger murder of a rare violin collector and his daughter, as told by their friends and two suspects at the heart of the police investigation.

programme.title: Posthuman S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets some of the world's most advanced, intelligent, robots. Will the creation of a synthetic species with human-like intelligence improve the human experience, or end it?

programme.title: Posthuman S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Can we have real intimacy with machines? Emily Chang explores the future of such connections and the technologies powering a growing market of relationships-on-demand.

programme.title: Posthuman S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: From brain implants that allow paralyzed patients to communicate to the wearable devices enhancing our capabilities, brain-computer interfaces could change the way we use our minds forever.

programme.title: Posthuman S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: From birth to death, tech is stretching the boundaries of biology. In this episode of Posthuman, we explore the discoveries that could transform reproduction, healthcare and how we die.

programme.title: Next in Sports
programme.desc: Americans Cash in on a Paddle-Sport Obsession. Pickleball is the hottest sport in America. In the premiere of "Next in Sports," we test the case for the paddle craze.

programme.title: Next in Sports
programme.desc: How Formula One Finally Hooked America. Not so long ago it was the circuits of Monaco and Monza that epitomized Formula 1. Its modern ambitions, however, are more Miami.

programme.title: Next in Sports
programme.desc: How to Build a Brand New Sport. Despite Teqball being relatively unknown, the sport's creators have big plans for it. Can you build any game into a mainstream sport if you have the will and the money?

programme.title: Next in Sports
programme.desc: The American Cornhole League wants to transform cornhole from Americana staple to worldwide phenomenon.

programme.title: Next in Sports
programme.desc: Next in Sports explores new sports, as well as innovations in existing pastimes, illustrating what's happening around the corner and across the globe.

programme.title: Hello World S2 - EP 6
programme.desc: Denver, Colorado: come for the sunshine, stay for the community of tech mavericks. From rocket engines to sci-fi weapons, the next great US tech firm may already be taking shape in the Mountain West.

programme.title: Hello World S2 - EP 7
programme.desc: Switzerland is full of advanced tech startups. We visit an inventor who makes drones do miraculous things and a company that's growing human skin in a lab.

programme.title: Hello World S2 - EP 8
programme.desc: From a company that helps restore movement in the paralysed to brain-research labs combining neuroscience and AI, Switzerland is home to some of the most advanced research on the brain.

programme.title: Hello World
programme.desc: Burning Man meets Mad Max at King of the Hammers, a 212-mile-long offroad race in the California desert that only the hardiest racers with the most kitted-out vehicles will even finish.

programme.title: Hello World S2 - EP 10
programme.desc: The Nigerian tech boom has been fuelled by payments and mobile tech. As the country looks to leapfrog ahead, it's turning to an ambitious young workforce.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: The New Zealanders
programme.desc: The New Zealanders is a beautifully shot series introducing us to some of the quirkiest locations and heart-warming characters throughout New Zealand.

programme.title: The World From Above S1
programme.desc: A highly popular, breathtaking series of aerial programmes offering an entirely different view of the world. From 10,000ft down to just a few feet above the ground, we discover new perspectives through thrilling journeys: from mountains and the world's most picturesque cities, to fantastic castles and the great natural wonders of the globe.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: Waktunya Srimulat Bercyanda
programme.desc: Nunung is a rich widow who has an only child (Anita Hara). Nunung already has a husband-to-be and wants to get married but is embarrassed because Anita hasn't gotten married yet. Meanwhile, Anita, who also has a husband-to-be (Bedu), doesn't want to get married if her mother (Nunung) isn't married yet.

programme.title: Land Of Santri
programme.desc: Documentary program that tells the daily life of the students at the leading Islamic boarding schools in Indonesia. Land of Santri will open the eyes of the audience with a storyline that often describes the unique and positive curriculum on education in each pesantren so that it can produce quality graduates. The State of Santri provides insight that pesantren education has a quality that is not inferior to other general education.

programme.title: Cahaya Ramadan
programme.desc: An Islamic Talkshow program that is studied in depth with a Doctor of Philosophy, Fahrudin Faiz, the pioneer of "Ngaji Filsafat" and hosted by Maman Suherman or commonly called "Kang Maman".

programme.title: Ruang Makna
programme.desc: A program that discusses the meaning of words that are often heard and used every day in the context of life. Presented concisely and easy to understand.

programme.title: Sport's Tale
programme.desc: Apart from being competitive, there are still many unique stories behind sports. The philosophy of sports club logos, to how much money is needed for a racing event, is discussed in this program.

programme.title: Vet Tales
programme.desc: Follow the daily ups and downs of two enthusiastic and entertaining New Zealand veterinarians - Dr Mark Young and Dr Stacey Tremain. These long-time friends graduated vet school together 20 years ago. Mark is now a rural vet working with large animals and Stacey works in a busy animal hospital dealing with smaller patients.

programme.title: Dr Lisa To The Rescue
programme.desc: Emergency vet Dr. Lisa Chimes ventures out of the surgery room to raise awareness about animal welfare in this compassionate pet rescue series. Lisa's mission is to encourage potential pet owners to adopt rescue animals from shelters rather than support puppy mills or backyard breeders.

programme.desc: A family drama about Seon-ju who embarks on a mission to break away from her failing marriage and rebuild her life.

programme.title: Meant To Be - EP 118
programme.desc: A TV station broadcasts a live show on Chi Hwan's case. Do Hyun is shocked by the TV host's query about his purchase of a liquid sleeping drug.

programme.title: Meant To Be - EP 119
programme.desc: Se Na confesses the truth on the chalet fire to the police. Sol is unconscious after she jumped into the sea to stop Chi Hwan from committing suicide.

programme.title: My Secret, Terrius - EP 2
programme.desc: Ae Rin mourns her husband's death while searching for her missing children. Bon, investigating her family's secrets, becomes their babysitter, unaware of the danger.

programme.title: Jang Bo Ri Is Here - EP 25
programme.desc: Jang Bo-ri, adopted by a poor family, learns she's the lost daughter of a rich Hanbok-making family, sparking rivalry with their adopted heir.

programme.title: Again My Life - EP 9

programme.title: The Half-Star Hotel In Lost Island - EP 41
programme.desc: Ahn Jung-hwan and the cast members bring new life to an abandoned home on a deserted island and cook food using ingredients from the sea for guests.

programme.title: Ordinary Greatness - EP 37
programme.desc: The story revolves around four newbie police officers going through various challenges on the job and overcoming hardship to become qualified policemen, fighting crime and protecting the safety of the community.

programme.title: Hit the Headlines
programme.desc: "Headline Talk Show" is a political show co-hosted by anchor Zhou Yuqin and director of the political center Lin Jiayuan. "Headline Talk Show" is the most daring-speak-out TV show. We speak out your voice!

programme.desc: Each episode of Big Boys Club invites singers, artistes as well as people from different walks of life as guests onto the show, participating in relaxed interviews and discussing current trends.

programme.title: Al Cappuccino - EP 13
programme.desc: Struggling actor Cheung Sai Lun gets invited to act as the son of a mafia boss and somehow gets forced into becoming a police informant. While working with undercover Ko Ban, he experiences a series of extraordinary comedic events.

programme.title: Anonymous Signal - EP 2
programme.desc: Three police rookies and a senior develop a tight relationship, until they part ways due to an operation. Mysterious text messages that can't be scientifically explained are being sent to them following a dismemberment murder of a young girl. Who sent them?

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2514
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.title: Terminals
programme.desc: Passengers often leave in a hurry after arrival at the airport, overlooking the unique characteristics of different airports! This show visits airports in nine countries including Japan and Switzerland, presenting them in a special light!

programme.desc: Lin Shao Chun is the daughter of a once-powerful government official. After being accused of corruption, her father and the rest of the family fall from grace. To make ends meet, she joins a troupe of travelling performers, but intends to avenge those who wronged her family.

programme.title: News At 18:30 and Global View
programme.desc: Bringing you the news from Hong Kong, the mainland and around the world every evening at 6:30pm.

programme.title: Friend Of Forest
programme.desc: In different corners of the world, some small islands are occupied by certain animals and become the animal kingdom! How do animals make the island special? How do they coexist with locals? Our hosts visit these islands to find out!

programme.title: Scoop 2025
programme.desc: This programme goes hot on the heels of the biggest happenings in society and the entertainment scene, bringing you the latest scoops.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2516
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.title: Anonymous Signal - EP 4
programme.desc: Three police rookies and a senior develop a tight relationship, until they part ways due to an operation. Mysterious text messages that can't be scientifically explained are being sent to them following a dismemberment murder of a young girl. Who sent them?

programme.title: What If - EP 4
programme.desc: Regular girl Xia Guo is faced with a dilemma. Would she choose to live a home-sweet-home life with her boyfriend in her hometown, or seize the opportunity to forge a successful career in a big city?

programme.title: Journey to Jianghu
programme.desc: Wayne Lai goes on a journey to unveil classic locations from martial arts novels, offering viewers a blend of cultural exploration and martial arts appreciation!

programme.title: Neigbuy Sale - Food and Beverage (Sr.2)
programme.desc: This show helps you find good bargains and save money on different items and experiences across Hong Kong!

programme.title: News Roundup
programme.desc: A round-up of the news before the day ends.

programme.title: Global View
programme.desc: Bringing you the news from Hong Kong, the mainland and around the world every day.

programme.title: Song Of Youth (TVB) - EP 22
programme.desc: Lin Shao Chun, the daughter of a formerly-powerful family during Ming Dynasty was left no choice but to join a performing troupe to stay afloat where she meets a rich heir, Sun Yu Lou. Will she pick love or seek justice for her family?

programme.title: The Midnight Studio - EP 7
programme.desc: The series tells a thrilling story of mean photographer Seo Ki Joo (Joo Won) who runs a photo studio that exists only for the deceased, passionate lawyer Han Boo (Kwon Nara) and the eerie night visitors, who travel between life and death.

programme.title: Brocade Odyssey - EP 4
programme.desc: The story tells of Ji Ying Ying (Tan Song Yun) from the Huahua Dyehouse during the Tang Dynasty. She bravely faces foreign invaders and guards her dyeing techniques. Later, she creatively spreads these methods overseas, becoming the Dyeing Ambassador of Tang.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1909
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Darkside of the Moon - EP 11
programme.desc: She Manyue (Tavia Yeung) appears to be a glamorous and skilled crisis management expert, but she has a tragic past. Eighteen years ago, she and her sister were assaulted by wealthy heir Jiang Jijun (Edward Ma), leading to a devastating upheaval in her family.

programme.title: Kill Me Love Me - EP 19
programme.desc: The story follows Prince Murong Jinghe of the Dayan Kingdom (Liu Xueyi) and a young girl Mei Lin (Wu Jinyan), from Qingzhou, as they support each other through the tides of fate. They bravely defy destiny, risking their lives to break free and persevere.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1911

programme.title: Love's Rebellion - EP 22
programme.desc: Nan Yan (Jing Tian) joins the Yangyue Sect to study poison techniques in order to treat her mother's heart condition. She inadvertently forms a 'marriage bond' with Emperor Ji Yang (Krien Zhang) and gets entangled in a huge conspiracy.

programme.title: Love's Rebellion - EP 23
programme.desc: Nan Yan (Jing Tian) joins the Yangyue Sect to study poison techniques in order to treat her mother's heart condition. She inadvertently forms a 'marriage bond' with Emperor Ji Yang (Krien Zhang) and gets entangled in a huge conspiracy.

programme.title: Links To Temptation - EP 17
programme.desc: The subtle relationship between Barrister SHING WAI-SHUN (Steven Ma) and pole dancer HUNG LONG-KIU (Fala Chen) begins with a cell phone. KIU has been treating SHUN hot and cold. On top of his he also finds her somewhat unpredictable so he decides to check her out secretly. His good friend KWAN HO-CHING (Yoyo Mung) discovers that KIU is going out with rich businessman KO WING-TAI (Lau Tan). Under SHUNs questioning, KIU confesses she is coveting TAIs money, telling him to give up his hope.

programme.title: Go! Go! Go! Operation C9 - EP 11
programme.desc: The organization to which agent C9 Yue Siu-Kiu (Samantha Ko) belongs is eradicated. Lonesome Siu-kiu encounters vegetable vendor Ko Tai-king (Kenneth Ma). After getting married, she takes care of her father-in-law Ko Au (Lee Ka Ting), big sister-in-law Ko Ching-lai (Yuen Kit Yee), younger brother-in-law Ko Tai-kiu (Brian Chu) and stepson Ko Hei-long, who collectively make up a dysfunctional family. She has become a proper housewife after five years.

programme.title: Freedom Memories - EP 11
programme.desc: Longtime friends Lau Tak-wing (Dickson Yu) and Chai Hing-chau (Karl Ting) are so eager to be admitted into the Artist Training Program that they push each other to their physical limits. In their dogged pursuit for stardom, the pair is joined by Keung Chi-ngan (Tiffany Lau), who was the first runner-up for Miss Hong Kong, and actress/showbiz baby Wan Chor-yue (Joey Thye), among others, on their journey towards living their dreams.

programme.title: LEGEND OF THE CONDOR HEROES - EP 13
programme.desc: Ching wins, but the raving Chau greatly annoys to invade Wong. At the end ,all of them are driven out of the Island. Afterwards, Ching and Yung have to overcome many obstacles before they can be reunited again._x000D_On the other hand, Hong and the Kam Emperor, in order to invade the Sung Dynasty , Plot to steal Wus book The Art of War from Sung. Their conspiracy is know by Ching and Yung , and they vow to protect their own country.

programme.title: Blade Heart - EP 2
programme.desc: The Szema family murdered the Tong family in order to monopolize the weapons industry. Twenty years later, the chief of Brocade Guards, YUEMAN FUNG (CHENG SIU CHOW, ADAM), fights against MRS. WONG (WANG MING CHUN, LIZA) of the biggest escort carrier in town. During the fight, they realize they might know each other_x000D__x000D_ FUNG has changed his name, put on an eye patch and become a Brocade Guard. His wife, TONG PIK, has married WONG.

During the fight, they realize they might know each other_x000D__x000D_ FUNG has changed his name, put on an eye patch and become a Brocade Guard. His wife, TONG PIK, has married WONG.

programme.title: Blade Heart - EP 5
programme.desc: The Szema family murdered the Tong family in order to monopolize the weapons industry. Twenty years later, the chief of Brocade Guards, YUEMAN FUNG (CHENG SIU CHOW, ADAM), fights against MRS. WONG (WANG MING CHUN, LIZA) of the biggest escort carrier in town. During the fight, they realize they might know each other_x000D__x000D_ FUNG has changed his name, put on an eye patch and become a Brocade Guard. His wife, TONG PIK, has married WONG.

programme.title: Links To Temptation - EP 18
programme.desc: The subtle relationship between Barrister SHING WAI-SHUN (Steven Ma) and pole dancer HUNG LONG-KIU (Fala Chen) begins with a cell phone. KIU has been treating SHUN hot and cold. On top of his he also finds her somewhat unpredictable so he decides to check her out secretly. His good friend KWAN HO-CHING (Yoyo Mung) discovers that KIU is going out with rich businessman KO WING-TAI (Lau Tan). Under SHUNs questioning, KIU confesses she is coveting TAIs money, telling him to give up his hope.

programme.title: Go! Go! Go! Operation C9 - EP 12
programme.desc: The organization to which agent C9 Yue Siu-Kiu (Samantha Ko) belongs is eradicated. Lonesome Siu-kiu encounters vegetable vendor Ko Tai-king (Kenneth Ma). After getting married, she takes care of her father-in-law Ko Au (Lee Ka Ting), big sister-in-law Ko Ching-lai (Yuen Kit Yee), younger brother-in-law Ko Tai-kiu (Brian Chu) and stepson Ko Hei-long, who collectively make up a dysfunctional family. She has become a proper housewife after five years.

programme.title: Freedom Memories - EP 11
programme.desc: Longtime friends Lau Tak-wing (Dickson Yu) and Chai Hing-chau (Karl Ting) are so eager to be admitted into the Artist Training Program that they push each other to their physical limits. In their dogged pursuit for stardom, the pair is joined by Keung Chi-ngan (Tiffany Lau), who was the first runner-up for Miss Hong Kong, and actress/showbiz baby Wan Chor-yue (Joey Thye), among others, on their journey towards living their dreams.

programme.title: LEGEND OF THE CONDOR HEROES - EP 14
programme.desc: Ching wins, but the raving Chau greatly annoys to invade Wong. At the end ,all of them are driven out of the Island. Afterwards, Ching and Yung have to overcome many obstacles before they can be reunited again._x000D_On the other hand, Hong and the Kam Emperor, in order to invade the Sung Dynasty , Plot to steal Wus book The Art of War from Sung. Their conspiracy is know by Ching and Yung , and they vow to protect their own country.

programme.title: LEGEND OF THE CONDOR HEROES - EP 15
programme.desc: TVBs across century billion-dollar production shows you the legend of a property giant._x000D__x000D_The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities.

programme.title: Blade Heart - EP 6
programme.desc: The Szema family murdered the Tong family in order to monopolize the weapons industry. Twenty years later, the chief of Brocade Guards, YUEMAN FUNG (CHENG SIU CHOW, ADAM), fights against MRS. WONG (WANG MING CHUN, LIZA) of the biggest escort carrier in town. During the fight, they realize they might know each other_x000D__x000D_ FUNG has changed his name, put on an eye patch and become a Brocade Guard. His wife, TONG PIK, has married WONG.
